title: SH 183 Construcion Irving and Dallas
text: The first phase of construction of the expansion of SH 183 through Irving and into west Dallas took place from 2015 to 2018. In 2020, work began on the $355 million interchange at SH 183 and Loop 12. The 183/12 work is the final major project of planned improvements in this area.

images.caption: This is the new westbound bridge over the Trinity River.
This is on the west side of the levee at the Trinity River crossing, showing the structure for the new westbound main lanes.
This looks westbound at Regency Street, just west of the Trinity River.

This view looks northbound along Loop 12 from the SH 183 overpass. The piers on the left are for the toll/HOV lane connections. At the time of this photo, the traffic connection from northbound Loop 12 to westbound SH 183 was using a detour on the Texas Plaza bridge in the distance.
This view looks north along Loop 12 from the Texas Plaza overpass, showing a large straddle bent for the HOV/toll lane connection.
This view looking south along Loop 12 from the Texas Plaza overpass shows piers for the HOV/toll connection ramp. SH 183 is in the distance.
Looking south, on the northwest side of the interchange.
The Stars and Stripes on display for the July 4 weekend, looking west.
Looking north along Loop 12
In April 2017 the straddle bent over the Loop 12 lanes was mostly complete
Substantial progress on the ramps in April 2017
Looking southwest
Driving westbound on SH 183 at Loop 12
Driving westbound on SH 183 near O'Connor. The freeway is being expanded on both sides of the existing freeway at this location.
Looking east toward Loop 12, just west of Loop 12. This will be the future westbound main lanes.
Looking west near Carl Road. At the time of this photo, these lanes were nearly ready for a traffic shift for the westbound lanes from the original pavement to the new pavement.
Looking east between O'Conner and Carl Road. The overpass over the railroad is ahead.
Looking east near MacArthur, with the  original lanes on the right and expansion under construction on the left.
The completed ramps on Loop 12, looking north from Texas Plaza Drive

This view (and subsequent views) shows work on the SH 183/Loop 12 interchange project, which also includes new connections to SH 482. Early work focused on the east side of Loop 12, including the SH 482 connections. This view looks east along the eastbound SH 183 feeder, with Maryland Street ahead.
This view shows work near Maryland street, for new connections to SH 482.
This view shows work near Maryland street, for new connections to SH 482.
Driving eastbound on SH 482 as it connects to SH 183
Looking north-northeast along Loop 12, just south of SH 183.
